testcase.name: App > should create the app

AuthLayoutComponent > should contain a router-outlet

MainLayoutComponent > should render navbar, router-outlet, and footer
HomeComponent > should create the component
HomeComponent > should render all homepage components
TimeAgoPipe > should return empty string if no value is provided
TimeAgoPipe > should return "Just now" when less than 1 minute ago
TimeAgoPipe > should return minutes ago
TimeAgoPipe > should return hours ago
TimeAgoPipe > should return days ago
JobCardComponent > should create component
JobCardComponent > togglePopup should switch isPopupOpen
JobCardComponent > closePopup should set isPopupOpen to false
JobCardComponent > should show the AI popup when isPopupOpen = true
JobCardComponent > should hide the AI popup when isPopupOpen = false
JobCardComponent > should close popup when clicking outside
JobCardComponent > should NOT close popup when clicking inside popup
JobCardComponent > getJobSummary should return the first sentence
JobCardComponent > getJobSummary should truncate long sentences
JobCardComponent > getJobSummary should return empty string if no description

JobDetailsPageComponent > should load job details from resolver on init
JobDetailsPageComponent > should handle resolver error state
JobDetailsPageComponent > should fetch related jobs after loading details
JobDetailsPageComponent > should handle error when related jobs request fails
ForgotPasswordComponent > should render the form
ForgotPasswordComponent > should bind email input via ngModel
ForgotPasswordComponent > should disable submit button when form is invalid
ForgotPasswordComponent > should show success message on valid reset request
ForgotPasswordComponent > should show error message when Supabase returns an error
ForgotPasswordComponent > should call supabase.resetPasswordForEmail with correct email
RegisterComponent > should render the Create Account title
RegisterComponent > should bind email, password, and confirmPassword inputs
RegisterComponent > should disable register button when form is invalid
RegisterComponent > should show an error when passwords do not match
RegisterComponent > should show Supabase error if signUp fails
RegisterComponent > should navigate to /check-email on successful registration
JobsListComponent > should load jobs on init and update the state
JobsListComponent > should log error and set isLoading=false when API fails
ResetPasswordComponent > should render the title
ResetPasswordComponent > should bind password and confirmPassword inputs
ResetPasswordComponent > should disable button when form is invalid
ResetPasswordComponent > should show an error when passwords do not match
ResetPasswordComponent > should show Supabase error when updateUser fails
ResetPasswordComponent > should navigate to /login on successful password update

CallToActionSectionComponent > should render the call to action button
CallToActionSectionComponent > should render the background visual elements

ProfilePageComponent > should hide loading spinner after profile is loaded

ProfilePageComponent > should pass the correct experience FormArray to ExperienceSectionComponent
ProfilePageComponent > should call updateMyProfile() with correct DTO when save is clicked
ProfilePageComponent > should NOT call updateMyProfile if form is invalid
LoginComponent > should render the login form title
LoginComponent > should bind email and password inputs with ngModel
LoginComponent > should disable submit button when form is invalid
LoginComponent > should show an error when login fails
LoginComponent > should show an error when no session is returned
LoginComponent > should navigate to /home after successful login
LoginComponent > should call signInWithOAuth when Google login is clicked
CarouselSectionComponent > should create the component

CarouselSectionComponent > should render all testimonials twice for seamless loop
CarouselSectionComponent > should render testimonial name and role correctly

HeroSectionComponent > should render hero image with alt text and src
HeroSectionComponent > should call AOS.init on ngOnInit
HowItWorksSectionComponent > should create the component

NavbarComponent > should have routerLink for Jobs, Dashboard, and Profile
NavbarComponent > should have routerLink for Login and Sign Up
NavbarComponent > should toggle mobile menu visibility in the DOM
JobSkillsComponent > should display matched skills
JobSkillsComponent > should display missing skills
JobSkillsComponent > should show overflow text when skills > 4
JobSkillsComponent > should NOT show overflow text when skills <= 4
JobAiPopupComponent > should display the explanation text
JobAiPopupComponent > should emit close event when clicking the button
JobScoreComponent > should display the score as a percentage
JobScoreComponent > should apply green color when score >= 0.75
JobScoreComponent > should apply yellow color when 0.4 <= score < 0.75
JobScoreComponent > should apply red color when score < 0.4
JobScoreComponent > should emit infoClick when AI icon is clicked

AiInsightsCardComponent > should show fallback text when aiExplanation is null
AiInsightsCardComponent > should show fallback text when aiExplanation is an empty string

JobSkillsBlockComponent > renders all provided skills
JobSkillsBlockComponent > shows fallback text when skills list is empty
JobSkillsBlockComponent > shows fallback text when skills is null
JobSkillsBlockComponent > shows fallback text when skills is undefined

JobDescriptionComponent > should render nothing when description is null
JobDescriptionComponent > should support multiline text (whitespace preserved)
JobSummaryCardComponent > renders role summary when provided
JobSummaryCardComponent > renders fallback role summary when missing
JobSummaryCardComponent > formats and displays the match score
JobSummaryCardComponent > renders matched skills when present
JobSummaryCardComponent > shows fallback when no matched skills
JobSummaryCardComponent > renders missing skills when present
JobSummaryCardComponent > shows fallback when no missing skills
JobSummaryCardComponent > enables apply link when applyUrl exists
JobSummaryCardComponent > disables apply link when applyUrl is missing

RelatedJobsComponent > renders related job cards when loading is false and jobs exist
RelatedJobsComponent > limits displayed skills to maximum of 3 per job
RelatedJobsComponent > generates correct job links
RelatedJobsComponent > renders nothing when not loading and no related jobs exist

JobTagsComponent > should show "Hybrid" tag when type is HYBRID

JobTagsComponent > isRemote should correctly detect REMOTE
JobTagsComponent > isHybrid should correctly detect HYBRID

BasicInfoComponent > should throw an error if the required form Input is missing
